job_tasks.phrase: generatieve AI services implementeren binnen Mendix apps
job_tasks.justification: Implementing generative AI services within Mendix apps clearly falls under building and deploying AI features into applications, which is a core aspect of Software Development.

job_tasks.phrase: Samen met datascientists sleutelen aan vernieuwende ML modellen
job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'sleutelen aan vernieuwende ML modellen' (tinkering with innovative ML models) directly indicates work on creating, training, or adapting machine learning models.

job_tasks.phrase: Nieuwe mogelijkheden van AI verkennen en samen met klanten slimme oplossingen ontwikkelen
job_tasks.justification: Exploring new AI possibilities and developing smart solutions with clients requires understanding business needs and translating them into technical solutions.

classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes implementing generative AI services and developing solutions with clients, aligning strongly with the GenAI Engineer profile. The mention of 'sleutelen aan vernieuwende ML modellen' (tinkering with innovative ML models) also points towards generative model work.
